feed.title: Laboratory of Multi-omic Integrative Bioinformatics
feed.subtitle: WELCOME TO THE LABORATORY OF MULTI-OMIC INTEGRATIVE BIOINFORMATICS (LMIB)

entry.title: Welcome to the team Anis, Jelle and Lorenzo!

link.title: Welcome to the team Anis, Jelle and Lorenzo!

entry.content: We are thrilled to welcome Anis and Lorenzo, our incoming PhD students, and Jelle, our new research associate, to the LMIB team! Anis and Lorenzo will bring fresh perspectives and drive to our ongoing research on multi-omics integration, while Jelle’s experience as a research associate will help us push the boundaries of our work even further. We are looking forward to the exciting research and collaboration ahead with such a talented and dynamic group!
entry.summary: We are thrilled to welcome Anis and Lorenzo, our incoming PhD students, and Jelle, our new research associate, to the LMIB team! We are looking forward to the exciting research and collaboration ahead with such a talented and dynamic group!
